meanings: a thing got for nothing, free charge, gratuitousness
One would drink lye if it is free of charge

meanings.meaning: there's no such thing as a free lunch
look a gift horse in the mouth

vlive.korean: [공짜 좋아하는 편] - 커피 사주세요~ - 저도요~ Please buy coffee... - Me too. 듣기 View video Hyomstore : ep.16 바쁘다 바빠 효민본부장! 달려라 달려 횸스토어 MD들!
'연주로 공짜로 들어도 될까?' "Can we listen to the performance for free?" 듣기 View video NCT : 오랜만이다아아 js💚
vlive.english: "Can we listen to the performance for free?"

vlive.korean: 굳이 이해 안 해도 돼 - 공짜라고! You don't need to try to understand. - It's free! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : [Full] TXT COMEBACK! TALK X TOGETHER
vlive.english: You don't need to try to understand. - It's free!

vlive.korean: 뭐라 소개해야 되지? - 배달시키신 분? - 저요 공짜죠? How should I introduce him? - Who ordered this? - Me? It's free, right? 듣기 View video NCT : 오랜만이다아아 js💚
vlive.english: How should I introduce him? - Who ordered this? - Me? It's free, right?

vlive.korean: 공짜라는 말은 왜 빼요? For free, I presume? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 내 운명이라는 남자가 날 쌩깠다 [나의 이름에게] - EP.01

examples.korean: He’s always scrounging free meals off us. 발음듣기 그는 항상 우리에게서 공짜로 밥을 얻어먹는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s always scrounging free meals off us. 발음

examples.korean: He took all the freebies that were on offer. 발음듣기 그는 제공되는 모든 공짜 물품들을 다 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He took all the freebies that were on offer. 발음

examples.korean: You can hardly expect her to do it for free. 발음듣기 그녀가 공짜로 그것을 해 주리라고는 결코 기대할 수 없을 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can hardly expect her to do it for free. 발음

examples.korean: You’re not doing yourself any favours, working for nothing. 발음듣기 넌 네게 전혀 득이 안 될 일을 하고 있어. 공짜로 일이나 해 주고 말이야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’re not doing yourself any favours, working for nothing. 발음

examples.korean: There is no such thing as a free lunch. 발음듣기 세상에 공짜란 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is no such thing as a free lunch. 발음
